9E5.F.summary: Samko Timber Limited, an integrated wood resource processor, provides primary and secondary processed timber products for residential, commercial, and industrial applications. The company operates through two segment, SGS and ST divisions. The SGS division manufactures and sells primary processed timber products, such as general plywood and laminated veneer lumber; and secondary processed timber products, including truck, piano body parts, and decking products. The ST division trades in various types of timber products; and produces secondary timber products comprising doors and windows. The company is also involved in the wholesale of plywood, sawn timber, logs, and related products; and production of wood panels and flooring products, as well as other wood based furniture. The company's plantation areas cover 1,397 hectares located in Java and Sulawesi, Indonesia. It primarily operates in Indonesia, North Asia, Malaysia, Singapore, the Middle East, Europe, the United States, Australia, South East Asia, and internationally. The company was founded in 1978 and is based in Singapore. Samko Timber Limited is a subsidiary of Sampoerna Forestry Limited.

BEI.SI.summary: LHT Holdings Limited manufactures and trades in wooden pallets and timber-related products in Singapore, Malaysia, and internationally. It operates through four segments: Pallet/Packaging, Timber Related Products, Technical Wood and Related Products, and Pallet Rental and Others. The Pallet/Packaging segment manufactures and supplies wooden pallets and cases for the packing of industrial products. The Timber Related Products segment trades in raw timber related products. The Technical Wood and Related Products segment manufactures Technical Wood, Technical Wood flooring, and wood waste collection products. The Pallet Rental and Others segment engages in pallet-leasing business. The company also operates as a timber merchant; saw miller; commission agent; and dealer in wood products, pallets, and packaging, as well as recycles and recovers wood waste. In addition, it manufactures, imports, and exports green products and woodchips, as well as provides industrial packaging and heat treatment services. The company was founded in 1977 and is based in Singapore.
